Hmmm... A 45 or so foot robot that knows martial arts?

::WarMachine::

WarMachine roars as autogun fire hits his armor, doing very little 
damage. A missile hits him as he gets to his feet, making a fairly 
large dent.

He aims his weapon at Mobster, firing shot after shot of plasma at 
him as his shoulder-mounted missile launchers fire away at the Mafia 
base.
